Scripts.OnClick: if (arg1 == "RightButton") then TmogSlot_OnClick(this:GetID(), arg1) else TmogSlot_OnClick(this:GetID()) end
if this:GetNormalTexture():GetTexture() == "Interface\\AddOns\\Tmog\\Textures\\tab_inactive" then Tmog_switchTab('items') Tmog_Search(TmogFrameSearchBox:GetText()) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText('Select Type', nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText('Revert', nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_TOPRIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText('Select an Outfit', nil, nil, nil, nil, 1)

Scripts.OnClick: local box = this:GetParent() box:SetText("") box:ClearFocus() if box:GetText() == "" then return end Tmog_Search(box:GetText())

Scripts.OnEnterPressed: Tmog_Search(this:GetText()) this:ClearFocus() if this:GetText() == "" then TmogFrameSearchBoxIcon:Show() else TmogFrameSearchBoxIcon:Hide() end
Scripts.OnTextChanged: Tmog_Search(this:GetText()) if this:GetText() == "" then TmogFrameSearchBoxIcon:Show() else TmogFrameSearchBoxIcon:Hide() end

Scripts.OnEnter: local version = GetAddOnMetadata("Tmog", "Version") GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_TOPLEFT", 0, 0) GameTooltip:AddLine('Tmog v.' .. version, 1, 1, 1) GameTooltip:AddLine('Left-click to toggle dressing room\nHold Left-click and drag to move this button') GameTooltip:Show()
Scripts.OnEvent: if event then if event == "PLAYER_LOGIN" then this:ClearAllPoints() this:SetPoint('CENTER', UIParent, 'BOTTOMLEFT', unpack(TMOG_POSITION or {this:GetCenter()})) end end
